features: Discover true happiness with this blend of sweet floral scents and soothing lavender essence.
Great for all types of clothes, including active wear and sleepwear, these concentrated Pacs conveniently dissolve completely in your wash with no messes or spills.
Simply place a Scent Pac into the washer drum before adding your laundry, adding detergent as you normally would.
Scent Boosters are safe for all washing machine types, including high efficiency (HE) washers
This package includes one tub of 56 Snuggle Lavender Joy scent boosters, enough for 56 loads.
body.description: Discover true happiness with the aroma of sweet orchid and plumeria notes blended with soft vanilla and the soothing essence of lavender found in Snuggle Lavender Joy scent boosters. Great for all types of clothes, including active wear and sleepwear, these concentrated pacs conveniently dissolve completely in your wash with no messes or spills. Simply place a Snuggle scent booster into the washer drum before adding your laundry, adding detergent as you normally would. Snuggle Scent Boosters are safe for all washing machine types, including high efficiency (HE) washers. This package includes one tub of 56 Snuggle Lavender Joy scent boosters, enough for 56 loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use Snuggle Scent Boosters: Toss directly into the washer drum Place into your washing machine before you load your clothes. Add your laundry Add your laundry and detergent into the washer as you normally would. Wash Pacs will dissolve completely in your washer and infuse your laundry with freshness, at any water temperature. Enjoy the Snifference

Enjoy each of our Snuggly benefits! Freshen Scent Boosters mess-free, pre-measured pacs will deliver a burst of long-lasting freshness to your laundry. Soften Snuggle liquid fabric conditioners give you the Snuggly Softness that your family loves, and have Fresh Release technology that ensures your fabrics stay fresh for 30 days. Control Static Control static cling, reduce wrinkles, and deliver that final touch of freshness to your laundry with Snuggle dryer sheets.

Blue Iris Bliss Find your happiness with Blue Iris Bliss, a crisp and invigorating mix of bright citrus nuances blended with hints of fresh red berry and finished with warm woody notes and soft musk. Lavender Joy Discover true happiness with Lavender Joy, a fragrant blend of sweet orchid and plumeria notes combined with soft vanilla and the soothing essence of lavender. Wild Orchid Wonder Relax with Wild Orchid Wonder and enjoy the sumptuous blend of sugared vanilla orchid and delicate white florals paired with notes of sandalwood and amber. Island Dreams Escape to your island paradise with Island Dreams, a dreamy blend of tropical mango and pineapple immersed in lush floral notes of freesia and gardenia. Blue Iris Bliss Lavender Joy Wild Orchid Wonder Island Dreams

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snuggle is the best
reviews.reviewText: I love most of the snuggle product and this one is not an exception. This product adds a wonderful but subtle smell to my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent booster
reviews.reviewText: I agree with some who say the pods don’t dissolve in cold water, which is mostly all I use. I solved that by cutting the pods pen and sprinkling the powder in the washer on the clothes. It dissolved easily when washing not leaving any kind of stain on the clothes. What it does is leave a great fragrance that lasts on the clothes for weeks. The color of the pod doesn’t make a difference in the scent, it smells wonderful. Also it is less expensive than most scent boosters so it is worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and price
reviews.reviewText: Amazon always has the best price for the bulk boxes of these. The scent is nice and works well for our laundry needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laundry Smells SO Good!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Snuggle fabric softener (liquid and sheets) for years and years and I'm a HUGE fan. I finally decided to try the scent boosters. I chose Lavender & Vanilla Orchid scent with 56 scent booster pacs. They come in a plastic box, convenient for storing. The directions couldn't be any easier-add a pod to the washing machine drum prior to adding the laundry, then add detergent like usual. That's all there is to it! The plastic wrapping on the pacs dissolve in the water as does the scent booster. Laundry is left smelling wonderful and not at all overpowering/gagging.I've experienced no issues whatsoever. Love these booster pacs and the way the laundry smells. The price is VERY reasonable. (I signed up for Amazon's 'subscribe and save' and got a nice discount on the booster pacs.) They can be used in any type of washing machine. Absolutely recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Use these every week
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used pellets before to make your laundry smell good but these are just more convenient. The scent that it leaves is really awesome and if I want a little bit more, I throw in two packets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: It does as good a job as the higher cost washer crystals great scent not overpowering

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years and now I'm unable to find it anywhere. Except Amazon that is. I was sure happy to find it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This article serves the purpose for which I bought it. It makes the clothes smell fresh.

reviews.reviewText: En la descripción dicen que es una tina, pero a mi me llegaron tres bolsitas con las cápsulas. Demasiado caro y no mandan el contenedor.

this is certainly not purple lavender pod. I have been using pods for all my washing loads and this looks weird .it's powdered with cheap looking plastic instead the usual pod plastic materials. also , image does not match the insides! don't buy please!
Smell us nice, but we've always washed all our clothes in cold water, and it doesn't always dissolve in the wash and can leave a stain on your clothes so you have to rehash.
